module.name: Web Services
module.description: Enables Launchpad to connect to and authenticate with remove services on the Internet for additional functionality.

web_services.data_types.account_info.name: Account Info
web_services.data_types.account_info.description: Account information related to an authentication session.

web_services.data_types.error_submission.name: Error Submission
web_services.data_types.error_submission.description: An endpoint to submit application errors to.

web_services.data_types.feedback_submiss.name: Feedback Submission
web_services.data_types.feedback_submiss.description: An endpoint to submit feedback to.

web_services.data_types.game_submission.name: Game Submission
web_services.data_types.game_submission.description: An endpoint to game launcher data to for sharing with the community.

web_services.data_types.release_info.name: Release Info
web_services.data_types.release_info.description: Information about the latest (or any) version of Launchpad

web_services.data_types.entity_list.name: Entity List
web_services.data_types.entity_list.description: A listing of entities from a web service.

web_services.data_types.entity_lookup.name: Entity Lookup
web_services.data_types.entity_lookup.description: Searches for the ID of a remote entity from the provided data.

web_services.data_types.entity_data.name: Entity Data
web_services.data_types.entity_data.description: Data to be imported into an entity within the application.

web_services.data_types.availability_che.name: Availability check
web_services.data_types.availability_che.description: Simply checks for any response from the web service.
